title: Anton Krotov
text:
Anton Alekseyevich Krotov (; born 28 January 1998) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Sokol%20Saratov">FC Sokol Saratov</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Luch%20Vladivostok">Luch Vladivostok</a> on 14 November 2018 in a game against <a href="FC%20Baltika%20Kaliningrad">Baltika Kaliningrad</a>.
